definition[1]: a narrow piece of cloth turned upwards at the bottom of a trouser leg
definition[2]: an action in which you hit someone lightly on the head with your hand open
definition[3]: a wide band of metal, leather, plastic etc, worn around the wrist as decoration
definition[4]: to hit someone lightly, especially in a friendly way
example[0]: She cuffed him playfully on the side of the head.
